title: Dolly Kitty Aur Woh Chamakte Sitare
short_cast: Bhumi Pednekar, Konkona Sen Sharma, Vikrant Massey, Amol Parashar, Aamir Bashir, Karan Kundra, Kalp Shah, Hearty Singh, Neelima Azim, Kubbra Sait
cast: Bhumi Pednekar, Konkona Sen Sharma, Vikrant Massey, Amol Parashar, Aamir Bashir, Karan Kundra, Kalp Shah, Hearty Singh, Neelima Azim, Kubbra Sait
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies
desc: A disillusioned Delhi wife and her new-in-town cousin navigate damning secrets, dreams and their thorny dynamic on their respective roads to freedom.
